detail_desc: Trousers in a cool linen and cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist with a frill trim and bow, and side pockets.
Fitted top in jersey with short sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes and a sewn-on fabric flower at the top. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined.

Set with a shirt and pair of shorts with braces. Shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a small print detail at the top and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Piqué shorts with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, a fake pocket with a flap and button at the front, a fake pocket with a button at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Loose-fitting jersey top in a viscose blend with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless fitted top in a sturdy rib knit with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Key pocket at the back, ventilating mesh sections, reflective details and a zip at the hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyamide content of the bra is partly recycled.
Thin metal Alice band with cat ears decorated with sparkly stones.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Imitation leather mules with open toes and a knot detail at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cycling shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam with ties at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Thin metal chain anklets, one with plastic beads and one with round metal pendants. Adjustable length.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.

Three-piece set in soft cotton jersey with a tunic, pair of leggings and matching hairband. Tunic with lace cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Patterned leggings with covered elastication at the waist, and a patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Round-necked T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Cotton chambray cap with embroidery on the front and concealed elastication at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scarf in a soft cashmere knit. Size 60x180 cm.
5-pocket chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw edges and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and gathered elastication at the top to create a draped effect. Concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved tunic in airy patterned chiffon with frills at the front and a small opening with a covered button at the front of the neck. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and hem for added width. V-necked underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Top in sturdy, stripe-print sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front.
Jumpsuit in jersey with draping. Deep V-neck, wrapover top, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Block-coloured sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with an enamelled heart.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with gently rounded toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 7.5 cm.
Poncho in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringed hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with buttons at the top, crotch and down the insides of the legs.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and seams with short frill trims at the front and around the armholes. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved “Best friends” tops in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sports vest tops in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, a racer back and twisted side seams.

Fully lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, frill trims at the top and a knot detail at the front. Narrow ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Short-sleeved blouse in softly draping satin. V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and decorative gathers around the neckline.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted fake back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases.

prod_name: SB Henry water resi ski jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, visible button fly and skinny legs.
Knee-high boots in suede with pointed toes. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 9 cm.
Hi-top trainers in leather and suede with a soft shaft with narrow elastication at the top, lacing, and a loop at the front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky, fluted rubber soles.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Blouse in a linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in a viscose weave with a resort collar, French front, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a photographic print on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a slim fit at the top. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket and straight legs with drawstring hems.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Alice band covered with wound grosgrain and decorated with glittery stars.

Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in slightly stretchy narrow-wale corduroy with elastication at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in jersey.
